yacl3.config.chatty:config.isEnabled.des: If disabled, the mod will do nothing
yacl3.config.chatty:config.hideEmptyMess: If enabled, any messages with no text such as a single dividing space will be hidden
yacl3.config.chatty:config.hideKillMessa: If enabled, notifications of players being killed will be hidden
yacl3.config.chatty:config.hideVoteMessa: If enabled, notifications of players voting will be hidden
yacl3.config.chatty:config.hideObamaMess: If enabled, Michelle Obama will not tell you to vote
yacl3.config.chatty:config.hideDiscordMe: If enabled, Discord messages will be hidden according to the specified filter
yacl3.config.chatty:config.filteredRanks: Ranks to filter in the format of 'Player, Premium, Mod', alternatively just write '*' to filter all
yacl3.config.chatty:config.invertDiscord: Invert the specified filter ranks, will allow rather than hide their messages
